dct_description_sm:
The "Hydrography" dataset is a polygon representation of New York City bodies of water. The data is comprised of polygon geometries with attribute information including water body name. Feature classifications include: 
	1. Lake/Reservior,
	2. Pond, 
	3. River,
	4. Stream wider than 8 feet,
	5. Wetland,
	6. Beach/Shoreline,
	7. Bay/Ocean.
dct_creator_sm: New York City Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications
dct_subject_sm: New York City bodies of water, Lake, Reservior, Pond, River, Stream wider than 8 feet, Wetland, Beach, Shoreline, Bay, Ocean.
